content.title: New Swarnima Scheme For Women
content.department: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
content.details: A term loan scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment for women entrepreneurs from backward classes to obtain a loan of up to ₹2,00,000/- @ 5% per annum, thereby providing them social & financial security. The scheme is introduced by National Backward Classes Finance and Development Corporation (NBCFDC) and implemented by State Channelising Agencies (SCAs) which act as the nodal agency.
benefits: A subsidy amount of ₹2,00,000/- @ 5% per annum, for self-employment. (The remaining amount has to be self-owned by the beneficiary.)
The beneficiary woman is not required to invest any amount of her own on the projects up to cost of ₹2,00,000/-.
eligibility: The applicant must be a FEMALE.
The age of the applicant must be between 18 and 55 years.
The applicant must be an Entrepreneur.
The Total Annual Family Income of the Applicant must be Less than ₹ 3 Lakh per Annum.
content.application_process: Offline. Eligible applicant needs to visit nearest SCA office, apply on prescribed form for Swarnima Scheme for Women. You can find your nearest SCA office at this link - https://nsfdc.nic.in/channel-patrners/scas. Enter the necessary details in the application form and mention the needs and choice of vocation and training requirements, if any. Submit your application form and the required documents to the same SCA office. After reviewing the application, the loan will be sanctioned by SCA.
documents_required: Passport size Photograph of the applicant

faqs.question: What is the maximum size of the loan under the Swarnima Scheme?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, the eligible woman entrepreneur can obtain a term loan of max. ₹1,00,000/- @ 5% per annum.

faqs.question: What is the minimum amount that I am required to invest on my own if the project cost is under Rs.2 LPA?
faqs.answer: The beneficiary women is not required to invest any amount of her own on the projects up to cost of ₹2,00,000/-.

faqs.question: How much will be the interest rate for the loan?
faqs.answer: The rate of interest would be as follows - NBCFDC to SCA: 2% per annum SCA to Beneficiary: 5% per annum.

faqs.question: By when am I expected to repay the loan?
faqs.answer: Loan is to be repaid in quarterly instalments with maximum 8 years (including the moratorium period of six months on the recovery of principal).

faqs.question: Can women entrepreneurs from GENERAL category also apply to this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme is open to women entrepreneurs from all the categories.

faqs.question: Is there a helpline number where I can get answers for my queries reg. the application process?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Toll Free Number is 18001023399.
